Affen.JoinDMText:
**Welcome to Echo Arena EU Teams! **The place to make a team, play other teams and generally advance the EU Echo Arena scene with the ultimate goal of defeating NA teams in tournaments. This is a *closed-off private space from NA players*, so don‚Äôt mention this server or talk about its contents. Keep discussions civil, don‚Äôt overly post memes or general pointless chatter. **Be respectful**, but as this is a competitive server some drama/salt/banter is expected between teams and players.

**MIXED SCRIMS**

Mixed scrims are fun games with random players, kind of like public matches but with the same group playing each other in a private match. A mixed scrim group will keep playing for as long as they feel like it (often 1-2 hours), with players dropping out and new players joining in.

**Don‚Äôt join a mixed scrim unless you can play for at least 30 minutes, don‚Äôt ask for a mixed scrim unless you can play for about an hour.**

Other than that, it‚Äôs first come first served. If you want to be alerted of these mixed scrims, join the @Scrimmer role by typing: `Affen scrimmer`
​
**TEAM SCRIMS**

Team scrims are ‚Äúpractice dates‚Äù where two existing teams can train against each other, usually for a duration of 1-2 hours. If you are in a team you can tag the @Teams role and ask for a specific day or time, for example: @Teams scrims 7-9 SUK (UK Time)? If  you want to play, answer and set it up in the chat. Avoid private messaging responses if possible so others know that the spot is taken.

**Don‚Äôt ask for a team scrim unless you have made sure your team can actually accept it and play for at least an hour.**

**Looking for teams role**: If you are looking for teams to join, assign yourself the @looking for team role by typing: `Affen looking for team`
